title: Plumber Needed for Bathroom Renovation
description: Looking for an experienced plumber to help with a complete bathroom renovation. Need to relocate pipes and install new fixtures including bathtub, shower, and sink.

title: Electrician for Rewiring Old House
description: Need a qualified electrician to rewire a Victorian house. The property has outdated wiring that needs to be completely replaced to meet current safety standards.

title: Kitchen Extension and Building Work
description: Looking for a builder to extend our kitchen. Project includes knocking down a wall, building an extension, and installing new windows and doors.

title: Carpentry Work for Custom Cabinets
description: Seeking a skilled carpenter to build custom cabinets for home office. Need someone with experience in bespoke furniture and fine woodwork.

title: Roof Repair and Maintenance
description: Need a roofer to fix leaking roof tiles and check overall roof condition. Some tiles are damaged and need replacement. Also need gutters cleaned.
